mapper.insert: insert into t_broken_limit (code, name, first_time, last_time, date, open_count, close_time_min, theme, loss_rate) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{closeTimeMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lossRate,jdbcType=REAL})
mapper.update: update t_broken_limit set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_time = #{firstTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_count = #{openCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, close_time_min = #{closeTimeMin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loss_rate = #{lossRate,jdbcType=REAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, first_time, last_time, date, open_count, close_time_min, theme, loss_rate from t_broken_limit where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, code, name, first_time, last_time, date, open_count, close_time_min, theme, loss_rate from t_broken_limit
mapper.insert:
insert into t_broken_limit (code,name,first_time,last_time,date,open_count,close_time_min,theme,loss_rate) values
(#{record.code},#{record.name},#{record.firstTime},#{record.lastTime},#{record.date},#{record.openCount},#{record.closeTimeMin} ,#{record.theme},cast(#{record.lossRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(14,5)) )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE code=values(code),name=values(name),first_time=values(first_time),last_time=values(last_time),date=values(date) ,open_count=values(open_count),close_time_min=values(close_time_min),theme=values(theme),loss_rate=values(loss_rate)
